timeline-perlnotexecutable: Ba za a iya kashe Perl ba: $1 ba fayil ne mai aiwatarwa ba. Tabbatar cewa an saita $wgTimelinePerlCommand daidai.
timeline-ploticusnotexecutable: Ba za a iya kashe Ploticus ba: $1 ba fayil ne mai aiwatarwa ba. Tabbatar cewa an saita $wgTimelinePloticusCommand daidai.
